summary: Greg Andersen calls Julie D'Arcane to ask for help with his hacky sacks. The sacks have been up on the balcony since 1988.
suggested_actions: Confirm the time of arrival with Julie D'Arcane to ensure she is available to assist with retrieving the hacky sacks.
Provide a brief description or list of the hacky sacks to clarify which items Greg is referring to.
Follow up with Julie after the call to ensure she received the message clearly and to address any potential misunderstandings.
